channel.title: -lol, ok?
channel.description: my last topic was answered with a link when i asked for the server ip...well i went to the link which was - http://runestatus.net/?x=servers. once i got there...i saw all the servers but i cant find where it tells me the servers ip anywhere...its like another fucking website for me to search for an ip...can it be so simple to tell me a freakin number plox?

item.title: -lol, ok?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Btw, http://runestatus.net/com/forumdisplay.php?f=8 thats where people post their server's.

Btw, try putting this for a host: cheezscape.servegame.org It's online right now.

This server here is up 99% of the time: scape-rune.net
On runestatus you just click on the authors name and their server IP is in their profile.

Read full topic

item.title: -lol, ok?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Dubble Wubble:

anyone else wanna be a complete stupid fuck?

it sounds like you are the only one being one of those right now, if you would simply search around you would probably find a thread with a working ip in it, for starters I would leave the general discussion board and try server development

oh and titles are supposed to be related to whats in your post, for future reference

Read full topic

item.title: -lol, ok?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Dubble Wubble:

for one, my title has nothing to do with my question that was stated in the body of my topic, and second...if i need to state things more clearly for you than they already are, you might want to get off your computer because id consider it hazardous to yourself...third if someone in real life came up to me and gave me such pointless input id probably knock his teeth down his throat...just for future reference. kthnxdie....anyone else wanna be a complete stupid fuck?

Im not going to argue with you, but there is definitly something wrong with you. I suggest you read the rules or leave. Acting like an angry nerd isn't getting you anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: -lol, ok?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Maybe if you found a normal way of asking? Your dandruff problems are not our concern, consult your dermatologist.

I don't know the number though. Btw, I went to runestatus and could see all the servers easily. Open your eyes, there are many ip's on the site.
